text:
I am using Apache with SSL and the ajp13 connector.  I am using basic 
authentication.  When I do this, request.getRemoteUser() does not return the 
user name unlike it does with Tomcat 3.2.  Tomcat is properly returning the 
port (443), the scheme (https), and the authentication type (Basic).  This is a 
regression in behavior.
creator: dzehme@mediaone.net

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 3847 ***
creator: nacho@apache.org
